description: Erection of a gable roof above the existing two storey side extension, a hip-to-gable conversion of the main roof, and a rear dormer, together with associated alterations to provide a loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

The facing materials used in the development to which this permission relates shall match those of the existing building(s) unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan 2016 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) (or any Order revoking and reenacting that Order with or without modification), no windows shall be inserted nor any other openings formed (other than those expressly authorised by this permission) at first floor level or above in the in the western (flank) elevation of the dwelling unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Condition 5 (Details of secure cycle parking facilities)) - RBK Planning Officers have reviewed the submitted information and consider that insufficient cycle storage has been proposed.  Furthermore, the style and siting of the proposed cycle rack would be neither covered, safe or secure.

Please provide a copy of proposed block plan scaled 1:500, providign a scale bar showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site.  The block plan should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.The submitted block plan does not show the proposed development in hatched or shaded.

Please confirm the description ''Conversion garage and storage into habitable space and cycle parking, erection of single storey rear extension and internal alteration. Replacement of all existing windows and doors. Alteration to fenestration.''
